name: Target deployment platform
description: Ubuntu Core (snap-only OS) on a physical touchscreen device. Ubuntu Frame as Wayland compositor. Three snaps: openphone-ui, openphone-core, openclaw. Snap configs go in snaps/openphone-core/ and snaps/openphone-ui/ (currently empty). Device form factor: 480x960.

title: All three services ship together on the device
rationale: openclaw AI agent runs locally on the device, not remotely. The only network dependencies are the LLM API (Claude) and external integrations like Gmail/Calendar. The core card â†’ act loop is fully offline-capable.
